## Logging.LogReporter.withValueFormatter() method

Creates a new [LogReporter](./ts-utils.logging.logreporter.md) with the same logger but a different value formatter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withValueFormatter<TN>(valueFormatter: LogValueFormatter<TN, TD>): LogReporter<TN, TD>;
```
